headline: CRWD vs. CSCO: Which Cybersecurity Stock Has an Edge Right Now?

headline: Georgetown University Selects Cisco to Transform Campus Connectivity
summary: Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO) today announced a multi-year partnership with Georgetown University to modernize the campus network, delivering advanced connectivity and new digital experiences powered by Cisco's latest networking technologies. headline: TeleMate Announces General Availability of Next-Generation UC&C Observability Platform
summary: ATLANTA, January 20, 2026--TeleMate launches a next-generation UC&C observability platform delivering enterprise-scale performance, WebRTC insight, and multi-vendor visibility.

headline: $744.4 Bn Unified Communications Market, 2033| Astute Analytica
